Show something is definitely true -> Confirming
Try to getas much as possible (sometimes unfairly) -> Exploit
Consider facts when makinga decision -> Taken into account
Provide people with what they want -> Cater for
Someone or something famousand important -> Iconic

questions.title: U4 p47 Rev1 Articles indefinite, definitie, zero (review)
body: Complete the textwith a/an, the or — (no article). After
incredible 859 daysand 6,000 miles, British explorer Ed Stafford became
firstman to walk
entire length of
Amazon. Hefinally reached
Atlantic in
Brazil twoand a half years after he started his epic adventure in
jungles of Peru. The final leg proved one of
mostchallenging, with Mr Stafford collapsing
few hours beforereaching his final destination. Mr Stafford fell out with his original walkingpartner Luke Collyer, 37,
outdoor activities instructor, andafter only three months, Mr Collyer returned to
UK. MrStafford advertised for
walking partner and was joined bySanchez Rivera,
Peruvian forestry worker. Living off
piranha and rice, they made their way through Peru, Colombiaand Brazil. Mr Stafford said on Monday, ‘All I want now is
portion of fish and chips and
nice cold beer’.
